events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for applying and we will review your resume shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your background and skills in software development.
A recruiter from the Engineering team has been assigned to your case and will be your point of contact moving forward.
Our recruiter has completed the initial screening call; you demonstrated strong understanding of software development principles.
Thank you for your detailed responses during the screening interview; we appreciate your enthusiasm for the engineering role.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our senior engineering team for May 10th at 14:00 UTC.
You successfully completed the technical interview, showcasing solid problem-solving skills and proficiency in software engineering.
Your HR interview is scheduled for May 14th at 11:00 UTC to discuss culture fit and company policies.
We completed your HR interview; you expressed excellent alignment with our company values and team culture.
We are excited to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position including competitive salary and benefits package.
You provided feedback on the offer indicating enthusiasm and willingness to join our engineering team.
Congratulations! You have accepted the offer and we are thrilled to welcome you to our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started with orientation and introduction to our development environments and tools.
The hiring process is officially closed as you have successfully joined the company as a Software Engineer.
